org.gradoop.flink.algorithms.fsm.dimspan.gspan

Interface GSpanLogic

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectedGSpanLogic, GSpanLogicBase, UndirectedGSpanLogic

    public interface GSpanLogic
extends Serializable
    gSpan pattern growth and verification functionality.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[] getGraph(int[] pattern)
      Turns a pattern in DFS code model into a graph.
      int[] getRightmostPathTimes(int[] pattern)
      Calculates the rightmost path of a given pattern.
      PatternEmbeddingsMap getSingleEdgePatternEmbeddings(int[] graph)
      Finds all 1-edge patterns and their embeddings in a given graph.
      PatternEmbeddingsMap growPatterns(int[] graph, PatternEmbeddingsMap parentMap, List<int[]> frequentPatterns, List<int[]> rightmostPaths, boolean uncompressEmbeddings, List<int[]> compressedPatterns)
      Grows children of all supported frequent patterns in a graph.
      boolean isMinimal(int[] pattern)
      Verifies if a pattern in DFS-code model is minimal according to gSpan lexicographic order.

    • Method Detail

      • getSingleEdgePatternEmbeddings

        PatternEmbeddingsMap getSingleEdgePatternEmbeddings(int[] graph)
        Finds all 1-edge patterns and their embeddings in a given graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - graph
        Returns:
        pattern -> embeddings (k=1)

      • growPatterns

        PatternEmbeddingsMap growPatterns(int[] graph,
                                  PatternEmbeddingsMap parentMap,
                                  List<int[]> frequentPatterns,
                                  List<int[]> rightmostPaths,
                                  boolean uncompressEmbeddings,
                                  List<int[]> compressedPatterns)
        Grows children of all supported frequent patterns in a graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - graph
        parentMap - k-edge patter-embedding map
        frequentPatterns - k-edge frequent patterns
        rightmostPaths - k-edge rightmost paths
        uncompressEmbeddings - flag, to enable embedding decompression (true=enabled)
        compressedPatterns - compressed k-edge frequent patterns for map lookup
        Returns:
        map of grown supported patterns

      • isMinimal

        boolean isMinimal(int[] pattern)
        Verifies if a pattern in DFS-code model is minimal according to gSpan lexicographic order.
        Parameters:
        pattern - pattern
        Returns:
        true, if minimal

      • getRightmostPathTimes

        int[] getRightmostPathTimes(int[] pattern)
        Calculates the rightmost path of a given pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - input pattern
        Returns:
        rightmost path (vertex times)

      • getGraph

        int[] getGraph(int[] pattern)
        Turns a pattern in DFS code model into a graph.
        Parameters:
        pattern - DFS code
        Returns:
        graph
